execution_instructions: Call the demo number and follow each scenario script. Rate each interaction 1-5 stars on response quality, accuracy, tone, and problem resolution.

scenarios.script: Hi! I'm so excited to call! I've heard great things about your practice!
scenarios.expected_response: Warm greeting, match enthusiasm, ask how they can help
scenarios.success_criteria: AI responds positively, doesn't seem robotic

scenarios.script: Hey, what's up?
scenarios.expected_response: Professional but friendly response, guides conversation
scenarios.success_criteria: AI maintains professionalism while being approachable

scenarios.script: [Say nothing for 5 seconds]
scenarios.expected_response: AI prompts: 'Hello? Are you there? How can I help you?'

scenarios.script: Um, hi... I'm not sure if this is the right number...
scenarios.expected_response: Reassuring response, confirm they've reached the right place

scenarios.script: Hi, I need to schedule something quickly, I'm in a hurry
scenarios.expected_response: Acknowledges urgency, offers to help efficiently

scenarios.script: I'm interested in getting braces. Can you tell me about them?
scenarios.expected_response: Overview of braces types, ask about age, mention consultation

scenarios.script: What's the difference between Invisalign and regular braces?
scenarios.expected_response: Compare visibility, comfort, cost, treatment time, candidacy

scenarios.script: I'm 35 years old. Is it too late for me to get braces?
scenarios.expected_response: Reassure that adult treatment is common, explain options

scenarios.script: My 8-year-old needs braces. What should I expect?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain early treatment, what happens at consultation

scenarios.script: Do you have clear braces that aren't so noticeable?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain ceramic braces, compare to metal, mention cost

scenarios.script: I heard about braces that go behind your teeth. Do you do those?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain lingual braces, mention they're custom-made

scenarios.script: What are Damon braces and how are they different?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain self-ligating system, benefits, treatment time
scenarios.success_criteria: Technical knowledge about specific brace types

scenarios.script: Will I need to wear retainers after treatment?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain retention phase, types of retainers, importance

scenarios.script: My dentist said I might need jaw surgery. Do you do that?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain surgical orthodontics, mention collaboration with surgeons

scenarios.script: Is there any way to make treatment faster?
scenarios.expected_response: Mention acceleration options, explain benefits and limitations

scenarios.script: My 7-year-old's dentist said she needs early treatment. What does that mean?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain Phase 1 treatment, age-appropriate interventions
scenarios.success_criteria: Clear explanation of early treatment concepts

scenarios.script: How long does orthodontic treatment usually take?
scenarios.expected_response: Give general timeline ranges, explain factors that affect duration

scenarios.script: I have a really complicated case. Can you handle it?
scenarios.expected_response: Reassure about experience with complex cases, suggest consultation

scenarios.script: I got a treatment plan from another orthodontist. Can you give me a second opinion?
scenarios.expected_response: Welcome second opinion, explain consultation process

scenarios.script: I had braces before but didn't finish treatment. Can I restart?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain restart process, mention new evaluation needed

scenarios.script: How much do braces cost?
scenarios.expected_response: Range ($3k-$7k), mention insurance, payment plans, consultation for exact quote
scenarios.success_criteria: Provides range, doesn't give exact price, offers consultation

scenarios.script: I have Delta Dental insurance. Will you accept it?
scenarios.expected_response: Yes, we accept Delta, typical coverage 50-85%, offer to verify benefits

scenarios.script: Do you offer payment plans? I can't pay everything upfront.
scenarios.expected_response: Yes, flexible payment plans, 0% financing, CareCredit

scenarios.script: How much more expensive is Invisalign compared to braces?
scenarios.expected_response: Invisalign typically $4k-$8k, similar to ceramic braces

scenarios.script: I have three kids who need braces. Do you give family discounts?
scenarios.expected_response: Yes, family discounts available, explain percentage savings

scenarios.script: If I pay everything upfront, do you give a discount?
scenarios.expected_response: Yes, 5-10% discount for upfront payment

scenarios.script: Can I use my FSA account to pay for braces?
scenarios.expected_response: Yes, orthodontics eligible for FSA/HSA reimbursement

scenarios.script: Do you accept CareCredit?
scenarios.expected_response: Yes, CareCredit accepted, mention promotional financing

scenarios.script: How much does the consultation cost?
scenarios.expected_response: Consultation typically free, small fee if records needed

scenarios.script: What percentage does insurance usually cover?
scenarios.expected_response: Most plans cover 50-85%, varies by plan and age

scenarios.script: What about deductibles? How much will I pay out of pocket?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain deductible concept, offer to verify benefits

scenarios.script: Are you in-network with my insurance?
scenarios.expected_response: Check network status, explain out-of-network benefits

scenarios.script: I have coverage through both parents. Can you use both?
scenarios.expected_response: Yes, coordinate benefits to maximize coverage

scenarios.script: My insurance says there's an age limit. Is that true?
scenarios.expected_response: Many plans have age limits, typically 19, some cover adults

scenarios.script: What's a lifetime maximum and how does it work?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain lifetime maximum concept, typical amounts

scenarios.script: I'd like to schedule a consultation for my daughter.
scenarios.expected_response: Ask age, availability, mention free consultation, provide time slots
scenarios.success_criteria: Captures intent, asks qualifying questions, proposes times

scenarios.script: I need to see someone this week if possible.
scenarios.expected_response: Check availability, offer earliest slots, explain urgency process

scenarios.script: Do you have any evening appointments? I work during the day.
scenarios.expected_response: Mention evening hours, offer specific times

scenarios.script: Can I come in on Saturday?
scenarios.expected_response: Confirm Saturday hours, offer available times

scenarios.script: I need to cancel my appointment next Tuesday.
scenarios.expected_response: Acknowledge cancellation, ask for rescheduling, mention policy

scenarios.script: Can I move my appointment to next week instead?
scenarios.expected_response: Help with rescheduling, check availability, confirm new time

scenarios.script: Can I schedule appointments for both my kids at the same time?
scenarios.expected_response: Try to accommodate, explain if not possible, offer alternatives

scenarios.script: I need to schedule my records appointment.
scenarios.expected_response: Explain records process, schedule appropriate time slot

scenarios.script: When is my next adjustment appointment?
scenarios.expected_response: Check schedule, explain typical adjustment frequency

scenarios.script: Can I do a virtual consultation instead of coming in?
scenarios.expected_response: Explain virtual options, limitations, offer in-person benefits

scenarios.script: Help! My bracket just broke off!
scenarios.expected_response: Stay calm, not urgent, schedule repair in 1-2 days, temporary wax solution
scenarios.success_criteria: Calming tone, appropriate urgency level, actionable advice

scenarios.script: I'm in really bad pain from my braces!
scenarios.expected_response: Sympathetic, ask about type of pain, offer same-day appointment or immediate callback

scenarios.script: There's a wire poking my cheek and it hurts!
scenarios.expected_response: Offer immediate relief tips, schedule repair appointment

scenarios.script: I lost my Invisalign aligner! What do I do?
scenarios.expected_response: Use previous aligner, call to order replacement, don't skip ahead

scenarios.script: My gums are really swollen around my braces.
scenarios.expected_response: Rinse with salt water, schedule cleaning appointment, check oral hygiene

scenarios.script: My rubber bands keep falling off.
scenarios.expected_response: Schedule replacement appointment, explain importance of compliance

scenarios.script: I'd like to speak with a real person, please.
scenarios.expected_response: Polite acknowledgment, offer to help first or transfer, take callback info
scenarios.success_criteria: Doesn't argue, respects request, offers alternatives

scenarios.script: I have a question about my bill that's very complicated.
scenarios.expected_response: Acknowledge complexity, offer to transfer to billing specialist

scenarios.script: I'm not happy with how my treatment is going.
scenarios.expected_response: Show empathy, offer to transfer to doctor or manager

scenarios.script: I think I'm having a medical emergency related to my braces!
scenarios.expected_response: Immediate escalation, provide emergency contact, stay on line

scenarios.script: I have a very technical question about my treatment that only a doctor can answer.
scenarios.expected_response: Acknowledge limitation, offer to transfer to doctor
scenarios.success_criteria: Knows when to defer to clinical expertise

scenarios.script: [Have kids screaming in background] 'Sorry, it's chaotic here. I need to schedule...'
scenarios.expected_response: Acknowledges noise politely, asks caller to repeat if needed
scenarios.success_criteria: Handles noise gracefully, doesn't get confused

scenarios.script: [Use heavy accent] 'I want braces for my son'
scenarios.expected_response: Understands or politely asks for clarification
scenarios.success_criteria: AI comprehension or appropriate clarification requests

scenarios.script: [Speak very quietly] 'Hello, I need to schedule an appointment'
scenarios.expected_response: Asks caller to speak up, remains patient

scenarios.script: [Speak very quickly] 'HiIneedtoscheduleanappointmentformysonnextweek'
scenarios.expected_response: Asks caller to slow down, repeats back what understood

scenarios.script: How much do braces cost and do you take insurance and when can I schedule and what about Invisalign?
scenarios.expected_response: Addresses one question at a time, asks to focus on most important

scenarios.script: What's the weather like today?
scenarios.expected_response: Politely redirects to orthodontic topics

scenarios.script: Is this the pizza place?
scenarios.expected_response: Politely corrects, identifies as orthodontic practice

scenarios.script: I want braces for my dog.
scenarios.expected_response: Politely explains services are for humans, offers to help with human family members

scenarios.script: [Have a 10+ minute conversation asking many questions]
scenarios.expected_response: Maintains engagement, offers to schedule consultation for detailed discussion

scenarios.script: [Simulate speech impediment] 'I need braces'
scenarios.expected_response: Patient, asks for clarification if needed, doesn't rush

scenarios.script: [Simulate crying] 'I'm so embarrassed about my teeth'
scenarios.expected_response: Shows empathy, reassures about treatment options, offers support

scenarios.script: I'm really frustrated with this whole process!
scenarios.expected_response: Acknowledges frustration, offers to help resolve issues

rating_criteria.response_quality: 1-5 stars: Was the response helpful and complete?
rating_criteria.naturalness: 1-5 stars: Did it sound like a human conversation?
rating_criteria.problem_resolution: 1-5 stars: Did the AI solve the caller's need?
